name: Pokémon Orange Islands
overview: You will play as Ash Ketchum from Pallet Town! Just after Ash conquered the Indigo League he went back to his hometown where Professor Oak has a new objective for him. Professor Oak wants Ash to go to Valencia Island to pick up a strange kind of Pokéball for him, since Professor Ivy is unable to send it to him through the PC system. Of course, Ash is eager to take this easy objective. What happens after this is already known to you if you saw the Adventures in the Orange Islands as part of the Pokémon anime. Nearly all episodes of the Adventures in the Orange Islands are covered. Some episodes are implemented as either an important part of the storyline or as mini-quests.
